name: Horseback Riding Adventure
summary:
Experience the thrill of horseback riding!

Use hand tracking to grab the reins and control your horse! No controllers are needed!

Enjoy the experience of Trail Riding on a massive map!
Test your horse control skills with Reining Mode!
Try to clear all the obstacles in Jumping Mode!
Race across the desert in Endurance Racing mode!
Try to hit all the targets in Jousting Mode!
Customize the color of your...
